[event]
# Wind sound
type=event
location=0,0,1,1
activate=on_load
soundfx=soundfx/environment/cave_wind_loop.ogg

[event]
# to Dead Forest
type=event
location=4,14,1,2
activate=on_trigger
hotspot=location
intermap=maps/06_dead_forest.txt,46,18
tooltip=Dead Forest

[enemy]
type=enemy
location=24,8,2,2
category=mad_wizard
level=4
number=1
